name: Nova Burst
desc: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming downed, characters immediately restore HP by 20% of their Max HP. The team can only trigger this effect 1 time(s) per battle.
enhanced_desc: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming downed, characters immediately restore HP by 100% of their Max HP. The team can only trigger this effect 1 time(s) per battle.
